CustomField.formula: Total_supplier_discount_amount_expected__c + If( Actual_Repayment_Received_Date__c < If( IsBlank(Expected_Payment_Date__c), Due_Date__c, Expected_Payment_Date__c), - Supplier_Cost_Adjustment_early_repayment__c, Amount_Overdue__c)
CustomField.label: Actual total supplier discount amount
